mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, r.score, r.created_at AS createdAt, rv.nickname AS reviewerNickname, re.nickname AS revieweeNickname, m.meeting_title AS meetingTitle, m.date AS meetingDate FROM participant_review r JOIN member rv ON r.reviewer_id = rv.member_id JOIN member re ON r.reviewee_id = re.member_id JOIN meeting m ON r.meeting_id = m.meeting_id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
